org.vngx.jsch.util

Interface SocketFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketFactory.DefaultSocketFactory

    public interface SocketFactory
    Interface for defining a factory which creates Sockets to a given host and port and supplies methods for retrieving input and output streams to read and write to open sockets.
    Author:
    Atsuhiko Yamanaka, Michael Laudati

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SocketFactory.DefaultSocketFactory
      Default implementation of SocketFactory for creating a socket connection to a host/port with or without a timeout.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SocketFactory DEFAULT_SOCKET_FACTORY
      Default SocketFactory implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Socket createSocket(String host, int port, int timeout)
      Creates a Socket to the specified host and port.
      InputStream getInputStream(Socket socket)
      Returns an InputStream to read from the specified socket.
      OutputStream getOutputStream(Socket socket)
      Returns an OutputStream to write to the specified socket.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_SOCKET_FACTORY

        static final SocketFactory DEFAULT_SOCKET_FACTORY
        Default SocketFactory implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • createSocket

        Socket createSocket(String host,
                    int port,
                    int timeout)
             throws IOException,
                    UnknownHostException
        Creates a Socket to the specified host and port. If the specified timeout in milliseconds is greater than 0, an exception will be thrown if a connection is not completed within the timeout.
        Parameters:
        host - to connect
        port - to connect
        timeout - in milliseconds to use when connecting
        Returns:
        socket to host and port
        Throws:
        IOException
        UnknownHostException

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream(Socket socket)
                    throws IOException
        Returns an InputStream to read from the specified socket.
        Parameters:
        socket -
        Returns:
        input stream to read from socket
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getOutputStream

        OutputStream getOutputStream(Socket socket)
                      throws IOException
        Returns an OutputStream to write to the specified socket.
        Parameters:
        socket -
        Returns:
        output stream to write to socket
        Throws:
        IOException
